Articles.Content:
So what do you plan on doing with Valentina first? 

For me she will be recruited into my air force as a fighter pilot.
Send her to eelo because I have a big colonie there ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Fly and Jeb on a mission to the Mun! :3

Should this go to General Discussion?
